name: Chennai
description: Capital of Tamil Nadu, a blend of cultural heritage and modern infrastructure.

popular_places.name: Marina Beach
popular_places.description: One of the longest beaches in the world, ideal for morning walks and sunsets.

popular_places.name: Kapaleeshwarar Temple
popular_places.description: A famous Dravidian-style temple in Mylapore dedicated to Lord Shiva.

popular_places.name: Fort St. George
popular_places.description: Historic British fort that now houses Tamil Nadu’s legislative assembly.

popular_places.name: Valluvar Kottam
popular_places.description: Monument built to honor the Tamil poet Thiruvalluvar.

hidden_places.name: Broken Bridge
hidden_places.description: An abandoned bridge at the Adyar estuary, a scenic spot for photographers.

hidden_places.name: Theosophical Society Gardens
hidden_places.description: A peaceful space in Adyar with ancient trees and heritage structures.

name: Coimbatore
description: A major hub of textile industries, Coimbatore is known as the Manchester of South India.

popular_places.name: Marudhamalai Temple
popular_places.description: A popular hill temple dedicated to Lord Murugan, offering scenic views.

popular_places.name: VOC Park and Zoo
popular_places.description: A family-friendly park with a small zoo and amusement rides.

popular_places.name: Perur Pateeswarar Temple
popular_places.description: Ancient Hindu temple with exquisite stone carvings, dedicated to Lord Shiva.

popular_places.name: Siruvani Waterfalls
popular_places.description: A natural waterfall known for its sweet water and lush surroundings.

hidden_places.name: Dhyanalinga Temple
hidden_places.description: An energy center created by Sadhguru, open to all religions and meditative practices.

hidden_places.name: Kovai Kondattam
hidden_places.description: A lesser-known water theme park perfect for families and kids.

name: Kanyakumari
description: The southernmost tip of India, where the Bay of Bengal, Arabian Sea, and Indian Ocean meet.

popular_places.name: Vivekananda Rock Memorial
popular_places.description: A sacred monument on a rocky island dedicated to Swami Vivekananda.

popular_places.name: Thiruvalluvar Statue
popular_places.description: A 133-foot-tall stone sculpture of the Tamil poet Thiruvalluvar near the Rock Memorial.

popular_places.name: Kanyakumari Beach
popular_places.description: A unique beach offering stunning views of sunrise and sunset over the ocean.

popular_places.name: Gandhi Memorial Mandapam
popular_places.description: Built where Gandhi's ashes were kept before immersion, the architecture is symbolic.

hidden_places.name: Mathur Aqueduct
hidden_places.description: One of the highest and longest aqueducts in South Asia, offering scenic views.

hidden_places.name: Vattakottai Fort
hidden_places.description: A coastal fort offering panoramic views of the sea and Western Ghats.
